name: Hybrimon
description:
This game is made for GMTK Game Jam 2021 with the theme "Joined Together".

Hybrimon stands for Hybrid Monster! Try out this game where you can create a new hybrid monster by "join" them together to solve puzzle. 

How to play:

- W, A, S, D to move the Monster.

#Assets and codes were made during 48 hours of the Jam

Background music from 

  • chosic.com
  • Time Alone by David Renda

Sfx:

  • reitanna - shake (freesound.org)
  • thebuilder15 - wrong (freesound.org)
  • bertrof - correct (freesound.org)
